title: 10% Gold & Silver: Portfolio Insurance for Hyperinflation #shorts
transcript: I will add a position to my long-term portfolio. 10% precious metals, gold and silver. That's it. It is just as a insurance against some kind of you know hyperinflation. Not only do I want to grow portfolio, I also want to preserve I want to preserve wealth. So for me to have 10% of of gold at nice moving averages is very important just for peace of mind in case we see like redefinition of what the dollar is or something crazy happens or some global conflict the wealth is going to flow from tradi into gold and silver which means that if you just have 10% like the capital migration is going to make it so that just those 10% can save your entire portfolio.
